title: WATCH & VOTE: Premier League Goals of the Week
description: Take a look at the best goals from the week's Premier League games and vote for your favourite.
content: There were some exquisite goals once more in the English top flight as Emre Can's fifth goal of the season set Liverpool on their way to a comfortable 3-0 win over Huddersfield on Tuesday night.Chelsea suffered their heaviest Premier League home defeat at the hands of Bournemouth, and Callum Wilson finished off a superb team move to break the deadlock as the Cherries swept to a 3-0 victory at Stamford Bridge.Theo Walcott was the star man as Everton defeated Leicester City 2-1 at Goodison Park with his second goal a fine finish at the far post.Tottenham were fast out of the traps against Manchester United as Christian Eriksen scored after just 11 seconds en route to a 2-0 win at Wembley while Sergio Aguero wrapped up a routine 3-0 win for Manchester City over West Brom at the Etihad Stadium.Hit play on the video above to see each of the goals and then vote for your favourite below...
